attributes.action: have points deducted from west ham or proof of tevez eligibility shown
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: i am neither a sheff utd of west ham fan/hater but i feel the decision not to deduct points off west ham "as they were involved in relegation battle" is totally unfair, its same as saying we only dock points if it counts for nothing. i also feel that had it been one of the smaller clubs that had done this then they would have been deducted points

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
